issue.title: [CI][Archery] Fix archery crossbow query to get latest prefix
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16107](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16107). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This feature stopped working when the crossbow builds were splitted into 3 parts
